name: Alpaca Game Testing
description:
Thank you so much to everyone who playtested during the last round, the feedback on how I can improve both the game and the survey itself was nothing short of amazing! I've got another build up if anyone is interested in checking it out.

This next version has had most of the area blocked off for now, and has had an older minigame of mine frankensteined into the build temporarily, to test out whether developing some minigames specific to this game might be worthwhile in future?

If you can find the time to fill out the following survey after playtesting the build, I would super appreciate it! It’s totally casual, there's no pressure, answers can be as long or short as you like, and you can even skip any questions you don’t feel like answering : https://goo.gl/forms/vsDDyYf1oH3Q5iRD3

(There's no WebGL version yet sorry, there's still too many shader bugs that won't allow it to build for web as of yet.)
